definitions.meaning: which? (interrogative, followed by classifier or numeral-classifier)

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng yào nǎ yī běn shū?

sentences.simplifiedText: 在这么多种水果中，你最喜欢吃哪一种？
sentences.traditionalText: 在這麼多種水果中，你最喜歡吃哪一種？
sentences.pinyin: Zài zhème duō zhǒng shuǐguǒ zhōng, nǐ zuì xǐhuan chī nǎ yī zhǒng?
sentences.translation: Among so many kinds of fruits, which one do you like to eat the most?
